question: I am 41 years old, very healthy. My doctor told my that due to my age its not possible for me to get pregnant. We are trying for the past 2 years. Please tell me some quarni duas
answer:
QUESTION
I am 41 years old, very healthy. My doctor told my that due to my age its not possible for me to get pregnant. We want to have kids very much. We are trying for the past 2 years. Please tell me some quarni duas to read so that god fullfil our dream of having kids. Please do respond to my question.
ANSWER


Share:
Jazakallah for responding to my mail. Sister, although you are 41 years old,%0D%0Aif Allah Ta'ala wills, you may have children. Only He knows what plans He%0D%0Ahas for you so do not despair.%0D%0AYou and your husband should perform Tahajjud salaah everyday and place your%0D%0Afull reliance on Him, the One who is Al-Mujeeb (the One who answers duas).%0D%0AIt will be very advantageous and beneficial for both of you to study a%0D%0Atafseer (plus translation) of the Holy Quran in depth in a language you%0D%0Aunderstand best. You will insha'allah gain further insight, understanding%0D%0Aand appreciation of why Allah Ta'ala has placed you on earth and what His%0D%0Aplans entail for you.%0D%0AI suggest that you read through the book with Allah Ta'ala's 99 beautiful%0D%0Anames%0D%0Aand choose the qualities which fit your needs and recite them frequently%0D%0Awith%0D%0Asincerity and full yaqeen in Allah Ta'ala.%0D%0AWe are totally dependent on Him for all our needs and%0D%0Aultimately we have to accept His final plan no matter how much we may%0D%0Afeel the lack or loss of an expectation.%0D%0A%0D%0AMay Allah Ta'ala grant you pious children who will be the coolness of your%0D%0Aeyes.%0D%0AAmeen.%0D%0AAnd Allah Ta'ala knows best.%0D%0A%0D%0ASister Fadila%0D%0ASocial department%0D%0A%0D%0ACHECKED & APPROVED: Mufti Ebrahim Desai
